title: League Crashing
body: I had my computer fixed today, when i got it back i tried to go into a game with my friends but as soon as got past champion select my game totally closed. It didn't reopen the game and give me a message it just closed and i would have reopen the game try to rejoin it would close my game again and i just can't fix it.

replies.body: Can you let me know what kind of repairs were done to your PC? This may give more insight as to what could be going wrong. As for the message you're seeing, can you go into more detail about what it says? It sounds like it may be a bugsplat error, but I'm not quite sure.

What i meant is i haven't been seeing a message when i go past champion select it instantly closes and no real repairs were done to the Laptop btw not a PC. A fan was apparently broken and when i got it back all i was told was that the fan is fine it just got a little dusty and my computer was reverted and my search engine was changed

Got it, thanks for providing additional context. Typically when the client suddenly disappears, it's because there was a sudden and complete disconnection from PvP.net or the Maestro service. When this happens, it can cause connection error messages or even crash your client entirely. Disconnections are most often caused by an unstable or poor connection to the servers, so I recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this.

Let me know if that caused any change for you.

Thank you so much for the help it was finally fixed i think it might of been a firewall problem since when i updated my firewall even though it said it was up to date it started working, but still thank you so much for the help {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
